alert.note: Alert for Baldwin (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 15 at 7:23PM CDT until June 15 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Baldwin County in southwestern Alabama... West central Santa Rosa County in northwestern Florida... Central Escambia County in northwestern Florida... * Until 815 PM CDT. * At 723 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 13 miles southwest of Molino, or 13 miles northeast of Robertsdale, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Ferry Pass, Ensley, Gonzalez, Pace and Floridatown. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
